title: Jinno Loves Going After His Girlfriend's Weak Spots
alternative_title: 神野くんはスキだらけな彼女が好きすぎる ; 진노 군은 빈틈투성이인 그녀가 너무 좋아 ; Jinno-kun wa Suki darake na Kanojo ga Suki sugiru
status: 神野くんはスキだらけな彼女が好きすぎる ; 진노 군은 빈틈투성이인 그녀가 너무 좋아 ; Jinno-kun wa Suki darake na Kanojo ga Suki sugiru
description:
Description :
        Cupid's arrow keeps missing its mark, and this love story will have you squirming impatiently until it hits! Serika is an office lady with a hobby for drawing manga (the erotic kind!), and she's in a pinch trying to make her deadline. That's when Jinno, a junior staff member at her company, steps in and helps her with her manuscript by becoming her assistant and reference material...! She's giving it her all to take reference photos... Huh? Why is Jinno pushing her down?!
